questions.question_text: What event will cause Agent Client Collector self-monitoring to pause data collection?

choices.B: The amount of host memory being used by the agent exceeds a threshold
choices.C: Communication with the ServiceNow instance is lost
choices.D: The amount of host disk space used by the agent exceeds a threshold
choices.A: Communication with the MID server is lost
choices.E: The amount of host CPU being utilized by the agent exceeds a threshold

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: E
E is correct
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-it-operations-management/page/product/agent-client-collector/reference/acc-set-silent-reference.html

questions.question_text: Agent Client Collector can perform application service monitoring by configuring what option?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-it-operations-management/page/product/agent-client-collector/concept/proxy-agent.html

questions.question_text: What are the valid states an alert can be in during its lifecycle?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A more appropriate place to reference:
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-it-operations-management/page/product/event-management/task/t_EMViewAlert.html

A
Same source as peter below

A
You can configure alert management rules to:
Automatically generate and link incidents, tasks, or knowledge articles to alerts.

questions.question_text: What Event Management module allows for configuration of automatic task creation?

You have a system configured with a MID Web Server using Basic authentication to enable Operational Management Intelligence (OI) to push raw metric data to the MID Server. No data is getting through to the MID Server.
What is the most likely cause of the issue?

choices.C: An invalid secret key is being passed in the header information of the URL for the REST request
choices.A: The MID Web Server needs to be Restarted
choices.B: The MID Web Server needs to be Started
choices.D: An invalid password is set in the MID Web Server Context
